scripts.build: npm run prettier:check && tsc --noEmit && npm run eslint:check
scripts.test: bun wiptest core.test.ts && bun wiptest integration-test/AdminEntity.test.ts && bun wiptest integration-test/AdvisoryLock.test.ts && bun wiptest integration-test/Auth.test.ts && bun wiptest integration-test/PublishedEntity.test.ts && bun wiptest integration-test/Schema.test.ts
